21CharacterPasswordGenerator is a secure and straightforward Chrome extension designed to instantly generate strong passwords for your online accounts. With just a single click, you get a random 21-character password comprising numbers, uppercase letters, lowercase letters, and symbols, ensuring robust security.

Key Features:

One-Click Generation: Simply click the 'Generate Password' button to get a new password instantly.
21 Characters: Every password is exactly 21 characters long, providing a consistent level of security.
Mixed Composition: Passwords include numbers, uppercase letters, lowercase letters, and symbols to meet most website security criteria.
Copy Functionality: Easily copy the generated password with a dedicated 'Copy' button.
Whether you're setting up a new online account or updating an existing password, '21CharacterPasswordGenerator' ensures you have a strong password in seconds.
